title: Things that feel worse than Zed
body:
Please post them. I'll start off with a few.

Endless Pantheon Q spam with Corrupting Potion.

Mechanically gifted Annies.

Being outplayed by an Akali.

Malzahar.

replies.body:
>Being **outplayed** by an Akali.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/679/057/322.gif
Yeah that was a big fucking /s
Yasuo's early lane dominance scaling into him being impossible to fight late game.
Oh rly?
Should for any reason Yasuo not being dominant over his lane opponent, he'll feed his minds out, due to being worth less than a minion.
literally every point and click cancerous champion with no counterplay.
Leblanc teleporting to me with he ult for max range and hitting me for half of my health when I'm only just outside of my tower range only to teleport back under her tower.

Outplayed, son.
Oh, let's add Rengar 100-0 from stealth to this list.
Blitzcrank missing every hook all game and finally lands 1 and they win the game
Never happens
Tank Ekko ?^^
Mages botlane :^)
teammates trolling and feeding. I'd rather face a godlike opponent than a malicious ally.
people dodging when i tell them yasuo jungle is legit
Tryndamere's ult

{{champion:67}} top

should be bannable
